page.title: 11Shoreham Village,Kent.
page.content:
Shoreham is one of many beautiful country villages in Kent.It was first occupied by {Stoneage} people in 2000 BC.
The village is quite peaceful in the day but at weekends and holidays it is rather crowded with{tourists.}On sunny summer days,Saturdays and Sundays,the two village shops have long queues.The {tourists come from the outskirts of {London}and other busy places.the building of the{railway}was very important because it brought tourism to the village and enabled people to live in Shoreham and work in London.
{ Shoreham is a lovely village with the {river Darent running through it,and {lies in a valley with woods}on either side.Parts of the bridge over the Darent are 14th Century.
